title: Dramborleg
data:

**Dramborleg** is an [artifact weapon](/wiki/Artifact_weapon "Artifact weapon") that appears in [EvilHack](/wiki/EvilHack "EvilHack") and [Hack'EM](/wiki/Hack%27EM "Hack'EM"). It is [lawful](/wiki/Lawful "Lawful") and [dwarf-favoring](/wiki/Dwarf_\(monster_attribute\) "Dwarf (monster attribute)"), and its [base item](/wiki/Base_item "Base item") is a [dwarvish bearded axe](/wiki/Dwarvish_bearded_axe "Dwarvish bearded axe") made of [mithril](/wiki/Mithril "Mithril").

## Generation

In addition to random generation, Dramborleg can appear as a sacrifice gift for lawful characters.

## Description

While wielded, Dramborleg provides [magic resistance](/wiki/Magic_resistance "Magic resistance") and one level of [magic cancellation](/wiki/Magic_cancellation "Magic cancellation"), and [warns its wielder](/wiki/Warned_of_monster_type "Warned of monster type") of [demons](/wiki/M2_DEMON "M2 DEMON") - any [balrogs](/wiki/Balrog "Balrog") hit by Dramborleg are [instantly killed](/wiki/Instadeath "Instadeath"). Due to its affinity with dwarves and lawfully aligned players, Dramborleg will [blast](/wiki/Artifact_blast "Artifact blast") any non-dwarf or non-lawful that wields it, and any character that is not lawful or not a dwarf will not be able to handle it.

## Encyclopedia entry

... but he carried an axe rather than a sword, and this in the  
speech of the Gondolindrim he named Dramborleg, for its buffet  
stunned and its edge clove all armour.  
\[ The Book of Lost Tales: Part Two,  
by J.R.R. Tolkien ]

- *This page is a **[stub](/wiki/Category:Stubs "Category:Stubs")**. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by [**expanding this page**.](https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Dramborleg\&action=edit)*

Dramborleg

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
)   Dramborleg   (No tile)
Base item dwarvish bearded axe
Damage vs. small 1d8 +1d8
Damage vs. large 1d10 +1d8
To-hit bonus +1d8
Bonus versus everything
Weapon skill dwarvish bearded axe
Size one-handed
Affiliation
  • lawful
  • dwarves
  • intelligent
When carried

(none)

When wielded
  • magic resistance
  • +1 MC
  • warned of demons
  • instakills balrogs
When invoked

(none)

Base price 9000 zm
Weight 26
Material mithril

Dramborleg is an artifact weapon that appears in EvilHack and Hack'EM. It is lawful and dwarf-favoring, and its base item is a dwarvish bearded axe made of mithril.

Generation

In addition to random generation, Dramborleg can appear as a sacrifice gift for lawful characters.

Description

While wielded, Dramborleg provides magic resistance and one level of magic cancellation, and warns its wielder of demons - any balrogs hit by Dramborleg are instantly killed. Due to its affinity with dwarves and lawfully aligned players, Dramborleg will blast any non-dwarf or non-lawful that wields it, and any character that is not lawful or not a dwarf will not be able to handle it.

Encyclopedia entry

... but he carried an axe rather than a sword, and this in the
speech of the Gondolindrim he named Dramborleg, for its buffet
stunned and its edge clove all armour.
[ The Book of Lost Tales: Part Two,
by J.R.R. Tolkien ]

This page is a stub. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by expanding this page.
